Title: #107 ISTE 2017: Google, Touch Screen Chromebooks, and more trends from #iste17
Description:
Kasey Bell @shakeuplearning sits down to talk about the hot trends at ISTE 2017 including lots of Google stuff, new AR news, Google Keep, touch Screen Chromebooks, and more news.

This episode is sponsored by Powerschool. Come by PowerSchool’s Classroom of the Future in 207A where they will be giving away Apple Watches, Microsoft Surfaces and Amazon Echo. Come by the PowerSchool booth 2918. For those of you not at ISTE check out the Unified Classroom at PowerSchool.com/solutions/unified-classroom. 

See the show notes and transcript for this episode at www.coolcatteacher.com/e107.
